entities.name: BOARD
entities.description: The Board is responsible for making decisions regarding fractional shares or rights for fractional shares of Common Stock.

entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The Company is responsible for issuing shares under the Award and ensuring compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

entities.name: SECURITIES ACT
entities.description: The Securities Act governs the registration requirements for shares issued under the Award.

entities.name: TREASURY REGULATIONS SECTION 1.409A-1(B)(4)
entities.description: Treasury Regulations Section 1.409A-1(b)(4) provides guidance on the issuance of shares of Common Stock in respect of the Restricted Stock Units.

relationships.relationship_description: The Board is responsible for rounding down any fractional shares or rights for fractional shares of Common Stock to the nearest whole share or whole unit of rights.
The Company determines whether shares of Common Stock can be issued under the Award based on compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
The Company must ensure that the issuance of shares under the Award complies with the registration requirements of the Securities Act or qualifies for an exemption.
The issuance of shares of Common Stock in respect of the Restricted Stock Units is intended to comply with Treasury Regulations Section 1.409A-1(b)(4).
